items.sentence: I want to wear the same kind of clothes Tom wears.
Tom said the box was too heavy to lift by himself.
The next time you do that, I'm going to spank you.
Can you sew a button on this shirt for me, please?
It's been a long time since I've written anything.
We're going to detonate the bomb in a few moments.
Unfortunately, I don't have any money with me now.
Can you remember the first time that you did that?
Can you tell me why you're planning on doing that?
Tom's family gathered around the table for a meal.
